ValidationRule.description: User is WEX EFS OTR Sales Profile Task Subject is Implementation Must Select a Call Outcome
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.ProfileId = "00e70000000xEHg", OR( CONTAINS(Subject, "Implement"), CONTAINS(Subject, "implement"), CONTAINS(Subject, "IMPLEMENT") ), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, "Not Started")), ISPICKVAL(CallOutcome__c, "") )
